nodes.text: So, you're looking for payback at the big game tonight?
Indeed!
I do not suppose that you would like to help me defeat Caesari, would you?
Sure, I'll be happy to help you in any way to do unto Sosi as he so richly deserves.
You are talking about cheating, right?
Let's just say that you may have an advantage whenever I deal.
What kind of help are you looking for?
Oh, it is just that I want to give you a little advantage whenever I am dealing the cards... Sosi will not have a hand that can beat you.
You want me to defeat Sosi in a hand of Poobah? Sounds good to me.
I don't want you to merely defeat Sosi at Poobah - I want you to break Sosi. Bet strong, make him put his money on the table.
Then it will be all the better when you show your winning hand.
No, thank you - I'm not the cheating type. I want to beat Sosi fair and square because I am better than he is.
It is a pity that you choose to be honorable against someone who has no honor.
I don't want to have anything to do with Sosi. You'll have to face him yourself.
And here I thought that you were my friend.
What makes you so sure that Sosi will lose at Poobah tonight?
Let it just be said that the odds are stacked in favor of Sosi losing.
I do not suppose that you would like to help me defeat Caesari, would you?
Sure, I'll be happy to help you in any way to do unto Sosi as he so richly deserves.
You are talking about cheating, right?
Let's just say that you may have an advantage whenever I deal.
What kind of help are you looking for?
Oh, it is just that I want to give you a little advantage whenever I am dealing the cards... Sosi will not have a hand that can beat you.
You want me to defeat Sosi in a hand of Poobah? Sounds good to me.
I don't want you to merely defeat Sosi at Poobah - I want you to break Sosi. Bet strong, make him put his money on the table.
Then it will be all the better when you show your winning hand.
No, thank you - I'm not the cheating type. I want to beat Sosi fair and square because I am better than he is.
What a pity...
I don't want to have anything to do with Sosi. You'll have to face him yourself.
And here I thought that you were my friend...
Got anything new for sale?
Sadly, no. It is so close to the end of the semester that I will just sell what items I already have in stock.
Picked up any new rumors?
Well, there is a rumor, unsubstantiated, of course, that Caesari closes his eyes when he has a good Poobah hand. I will be trying to verify that fact tonight.
See you later.
I am anticipating it with pleasure.
Perhaps...
